Text:
Thanks man!

^_^

This is the original US theatrical version [only 132 mins runtime]

Director's Cut has 142 mins [10 mins longer] and it's what Terry Giliam intended to do [available on Blu-Ray only with 2.0 audio]

Thanks GoodFilms!
